testimonials.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Reviews
testimonials.faq.a1: Everyone! Whether you are a client or just a visitor, we are interested in your opinion. Logged-in users will have their profile displayed.
testimonials.faq.a2: No, to ensure the quality and relevance of the testimonials, all reviews are subject to moderation before being published. This usually takes less than 24 hours.
testimonials.faq.q3: Can I edit my review after submitting it?
testimonials.faq.a3: Yes, you can edit your reviews from your dashboard. Each edit will resubmit the review for moderation.

home.hero.title: Get your German driving license quickly and easily
home.hero.subtitle: Professional service to help you obtain all types of German driving licenses. Simplified process, authentic documents.
home.features.title: Why choose PermisCode?
home.features.fast.title: Fast and efficient
home.features.fast.desc: Get your license in maximum 7 days without exam
home.features.secure.title: Secure and legal
home.features.support.title: 24/7 Support
home.process.title: How does it work?
home.process.subtitle: A simple and effective 4-step process to get your German driving license
home.process.step1.title: Registration
home.process.step1.desc: Create your account and choose your license type
home.process.step2.title: Documents
home.process.step3.title: Processing
home.process.step3.desc: Our team processes your application quickly
home.process.step4.title: Reception
home.process.step4.desc: Receive your authentic German driving license
home.guarantees.title: Our Guarantees
home.guarantees.subtitle: Your trust is our priority. We are committed to the quality of our service.
home.guarantees.legal.title: 100% Legal & Authentic
home.guarantees.legal.desc: All our licenses are officially registered and comply with German legislation.
home.guarantees.fast.title: Fast Processing
home.guarantees.fast.desc: We optimize every step to ensure you the shortest possible delays.
home.guarantees.satisfaction.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
home.guarantees.satisfaction.desc: Our team is at your disposal to ensure your complete satisfaction throughout the process.
home.gallery.title: License Gallery
home.gallery.subtitle: Discover some of the licenses we help you obtain.
home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
home.faq.q1.title: Is this really legal?
home.faq.q1.desc: Absolutely. We act as an administrative intermediary to facilitate your procedures. All licenses obtained through our services are 100% authentic and registered in official databases.
home.faq.q2.title: Do I have to take an exam?
home.faq.q2.desc: Our service is designed for those who already have driving skills but face administrative difficulties. We help you regularize your situation without retaking the exams.
home.faq.q3.title: What documents are needed?
home.faq.q3.desc: Basic documents include an ID, an e-photo, and a signature. Additional documents may be required depending on the license type. Everything is detailed in our application form.
home.faq.q4.title: How long does it take?
home.faq.q4.desc: The average time is 7 working days once your file is complete and validated by our teams. This may vary slightly depending on the complexity of the file.
home.cta.title: Ready to get your license?
home.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of drivers who trust us with their administrative procedures

contact.subtitle: A question? A specific request? Our team is here to listen.

services.requirement4: Valid email address and phone number

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Advanced tools for complete financial transparency.
pricing.grid_subtitle: Click on a license to see all details. All our prices are exclusive of tax.
pricing.calculator.title: Advanced Price Calculator
pricing.calculator.subtitle: Estimate the total cost of your license, including taxes.
pricing.calculator.disclaimer: This total is an estimate. The final amount will be confirmed upon ordering.
pricing.comparator.title: License Comparator
pricing.comparator.subtitle: Compare up to 3 licenses side-by-side.
pricing.package_builder.title: Package Builder
pricing.package_builder.subtitle: Create your license package and save money!
pricing.package_builder.empty_selection: Select licenses to create a package.
pricing.included.title: What is included in our prices?
pricing.included.item1.title: Complete Administrative Management
pricing.included.item2.title: File Creation and Follow-up
pricing.included.item2.desc: From creation to validation, we handle everything.
pricing.included.item3.title: Dedicated Customer Support
pricing.included.item3.desc: A team available to answer all your questions.
pricing.included.item4.title: Authenticity Guarantee
pricing.included.item4.desc: All licenses issued are 100% authentic and registered.
pricing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Pricing
pricing.faq.a1: No, our prices are transparent. The calculator gives you a very accurate estimate including taxes. The final amount is confirmed upon ordering.
pricing.faq.a2: We accept payments by credit card (Visa, MasterCard), PayPal, and certain cryptocurrencies. All transactions are secure.
pricing.faq.a3: Yes, payment plans are possible for certain cases. Please contact our support to discuss.
pricing.faq.q4.title: Why is there a regional tax?
pricing.faq.q4.desc: The regional tax on registration certificates (including driving licenses) is a mandatory tax collected on behalf of the regions. Its amount varies from one region to another.
pricing.faq.q5.title: Is the package discount automatic?
pricing.faq.q5.desc: Yes, the package builder automatically calculates and applies a 5% discount for 2 licenses and 10% for 3 or more licenses.
pricing.competitor.title: Why PermisCode is the Best Choice
pricing.competitor.subtitle: Compare our services with competitors and discover why thousands of customers trust us.
pricing.competitor.conclusion: With PermisCode, you benefit from a premium, fast and transparent service. We combine modern technology and human expertise to offer you the best possible experience.

legal.title: Legal Notice
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
terms.title: Terms of Service
legal.disclaimer_text: The content of this page is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. We recommend that you consult a legal professional to ensure compliance with the legislation applicable to your situation.
legal.content.hosting_address: Address: 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA
legal.content.ip_desc: This entire site is subject to French and international legislation on copyright and intellectual property. All reproduction rights are reserved, including for downloadable documents and iconographic and photographic representations.
legal.content.liability_desc: PermisCode strives to provide information as accurate as possible. However, it cannot be held responsible for omissions, inaccuracies, and deficiencies in the update, whether by its fault or by the third-party partners who provide this information.
privacy.content.intro: This privacy policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make an application on our site.
privacy.content.collection_desc: We collect information when you register, place an order, or fill out a form. The information collected includes:
privacy.content.collection_list.item2: Documents necessary for your application (ID, etc.)
privacy.content.usage_desc: The information we collect is used to: process your requests, personalize your experience, improve our website, and contact you by email.
privacy.content.sharing_desc: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties without your consent, except for trusted third parties who assist us in operating our site or conducting our business, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacy.content.security_desc: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. We use state-of-the-art encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online.
privacy.content.cookies_desc: We use cookies to improve access to our site and identify regular visitors. However, this use of cookies is in no way linked to any personally identifiable information on our site.
privacy.content.rights_desc: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to your personal data. You can exercise this right by contacting us at the following address: {{email}}.
terms.content.object_desc: These terms of service (TOS) aim to define the terms of provision of the PermisCode site services and their conditions of use by the user.
terms.content.services_desc: PermisCode offers an assistance and support service for obtaining German driving licenses. We act as an administrative intermediary on behalf of our clients.
terms.content.user_resp_desc: The user agrees to provide accurate, complete, and authentic information and documents. Any fraud or false statement will result in the immediate cancellation of the service without a refund and may be subject to prosecution.
terms.content.payment_desc: Payment for services is made online at the time of the order. Prices are indicated in euros and include all taxes. Payment is secure and irreversible.
terms.content.retraction_desc: In accordance with Article L221-28 of the Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal cannot be exercised for contracts for the supply of services fully performed before the end of the withdrawal period and whose execution has begun after the consumer's prior express agreement and express waiver of their right of withdrawal. By accepting these TOS, you expressly waive your right of withdrawal from the start of the service.
terms.content.liability_desc: PermisCode makes every effort to ensure the success of the procedures. However, our liability cannot be engaged in the event of refusal by the administration for reasons beyond our control (document fraud, criminal records, etc.).
terms.content.law_desc: These TOS are subject to German law. In the event of a dispute, and after an attempt to find an amicable solution, the German courts will have sole jurisdiction.
